dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frank, IВ’m saying I went to hunt

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: this bastard down.В  I found him and

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: blew his brains out.В  I executed him

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: in cold blood.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And IВ’m saying, Internal rules it

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: was a good shooting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Internal doesnВ’t know crap about me

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: killing Ryland.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: YouВ’re standing here and youВ’re

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: telling me you killed someone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In self-defense.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You were standing there with your

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: gun and then it went off and you

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: donВ’t remember how.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frank --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: В‘Cause guns go off accidentally.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Happens all the time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This was no accident.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: IВ’m saying itВ’s an accident.В  For

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: you to shoot someone, it has to be a

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: mistake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No mistake, no accident.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tim --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: YouВ’re a good cop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: IВ’m not a cop anymore.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: YouВ’ll always be a cop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: IВ’m a teacher now.В  A civilian.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I murdered this guy, В‘cause he was a

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: predator.В  He preyed on women.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why are you doing this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I put the gun right up to the motherВ’s

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: brain and I pulled the trigger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shut up. Just -- shut up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do I do, Frank?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You put this on me?В  You sunofabitch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have a conscience.В  I have one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I donВ’t know why mine keeps kicking

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: me, but it does.В  All the time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (taps his chest, open-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: palmed)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HereВ  IВ’m okay with it.В  In my heart,

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know I saved some girlВ’s life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Some girl in New Orleans.В  Who will

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: never know.В  ThatВ’s where Ryland was

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: headed.В  He said the girls were В“easyВ”

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: there.В  HeВ’d have В“accessВ” --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (taps his temple)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But here? В В В В В В В В В  Pause.В  PEMBLETON and BAYLISS exchange a look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I come back for this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe itВ’s В‘cause this James guy

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: heВ’s going to jail for basically the

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: same reasons I had for doing what I

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: did.В  And IВ’m out here.В  Free.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You wait В‘til IВ’m back and then you

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: have to unload, huh?В  Unburden

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: yourself... WhatВ’s supposed to happen

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You tell me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: IВ’m not bringing you in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: IВ’m not a cop.В  IВ’m not official.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So youВ’ll what, not tell anyone?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep my secret to yourself?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sunofabitch.В  YouВ’re a sunofabitch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You murdered him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WhoВ’s the primary?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lewis.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You talk to him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: YouВ’re the first to know.В  Who else

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: was I going to tell?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But did you talk to Lewis?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: About the case?В  No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No one suspects it was you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CВ’mon, me?В  WhoВ’d suspect me?В  Good

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: old Tim Bayliss.В  The Zen Detective.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hunh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So youВ’ll take me in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: IВ’m going to take you in?В  Are you wild?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: YouВ’ll take me in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did I take a bullet for you once?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cut it out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did I?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: IВ’m not taking you in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I take one for you, you take one for

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: me.В  ThatВ’s square business.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is not taking a bullet for you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is you wanting me to toss your

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ass into a jackpot.В  YouВ’re confessing

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: to a murder, Tim.В  You understand

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You want someone else to bring me

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: in.В  Someone else should bust me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then it has to be you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought about eating my gun.В  I

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: figured if I didnВ’t tell you and you

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: didnВ’t do what is right --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (taps temple)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- for here -- then thereВ’s only one

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: other way out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tim, cops in prison -- not a pretty

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: sight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I respect you, Frank, I love... you... В В В В В В В В В  PEMBLETON and BAYLISS look off, then back at each other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You thought about putting a gun to

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: yourself?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: YouВ’d be saving my life.В  I donВ’t

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: know for how long, but for now, at

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: least, you would.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I believe that you didnВ’t mean to do

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: this killing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If thatВ’s what you want to believe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you want to go back inside now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Never delay whatВ’s inevitable, right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It has to be what it has to be.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sonofabitch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frank, do you absolve me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Absolve you?В  I canВ’t.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CanВ’tВ  You mean you wonВ’t.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I canВ’t.В  Can not.В  ItВ’s not within

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: my power... В В В В В В В В В  BAYLISS takes his badge out of his pocket, hands it to

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PEMBLETON looks at it a moment, puts it in his В В В В В В В В В  pocket, looks out at the sky. PEMBLETON (cont.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think maybe Mary and I should stay

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: home tonight and have dinner with

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: the kids. В В В В В В В В В  As PEMBLETON and BAYLISS start back to Headquarters,

dialogues.text: SHEPPARD, FALSONE, DANVERS and Medical В В В В В В В В В  Examiners Doctor LAUSANNE and Doctor SCHEINER sit, drinking. В В В В В В В В В  BILLIE LOU tends bar.В  COX raises a glass to the room.

dialogues.text: A toast to Al Giardello.В  Too badass

dialogues.text: to die. В В В В В В В В В  ALL toast, hear-hear.

dialogues.text: HereВ’s to Bayliss and Pembleton --

dialogues.text: notoriously anti-social Frank

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pembleton here?

dialogues.text: And Bayliss, who knows?

dialogues.text: out.В  I mean, is he gay or bi or

dialogues.text: Who cares?

dialogues.text: Hey, hey, IВ’m in the middle of a

dialogues.text: finish a toast.

dialogues.text: Says who?

dialogues.text: Says me.В  So... To Bayliss and

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pembleton, who doggedly pursued the

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: case -- despite interference from

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: the Bosses -- and brought the shooter

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: to justice. В В В В В В В В В  ALL toast, hear-hear.В  SHEPPARD raises her glass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To new friends. В В В В В В В В В  ALL toast, hear-hear.В  LEWIS raises his glass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To old friends. В В В В В В В В В  ALL toast, hear-hear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To pathological friends

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hear, hear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: YВ’know, Lewis, I have always liked

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: this joint.В  Maybe I will be your

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: partner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. Really?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Really.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: IВ’ll sell you my share.В  In a New

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: York minute.

dialogues.text: Not so fast.В  WeВ’re still married.

dialogues.text: To partners. В В В В В В В В В  ALL toast, hear-hear.В  BRODIE enters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, Brodie, where you been?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The hospital.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WhatВ’s the latest?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He died.В  Lieutenant Giardello died. В В В В В В В В В  Shock, confusion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ThatВ’s not funny, son.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The doctor says it was some kind of

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: aneurysm.В  It was fast.В  There was

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: no pain.

dialogues.text: No pain, huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ThatВ’s what the doctor said. В В В В В В В В В  BOLANDER turns to HOWARD, takes her hand.В  BALLARD starts to В В В В В В В В В  cry.В  FALSONE comforts her.В  KELLERMAN and COX hug.В  STIVERS В В В В В В В В В  leans on DANVERS.В  SCHEINER, GRISCOM, SHEPPARD and LAUSANNE В В В В В В В В В  exchange a mournful glance.В  BILLIE LOU puts her hand on В В В В В В В В В  MUNCHВ’s shoulder.В  LEWIS rises, exits.
В В В В В В В В В  LEWIS comes out, stares up at Police Headquarters, sees:

dialogues.speaker: NIGHT
dialogues.text: В В В В В В В В В  MIKE stands looking down at The Waterfront.В  LEWIS nods to В В В В В В В В В  MIKE, who returns the gesture.В  MIKE heads inside.

В В В В В В В В В  MIKE, grieving, stops, feels in his pocket, takes out his В В В В В В В В В  Rosary.В  He contemplates it a long moment, puts it back in В В В В В В В В В  pocket.В  As MIKE enters:
В В В В В В В В В  MIKE walks past unfamiliar FACES.В  NAOMI walks by.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.text: mind.

dialogues.text: Thanks. В В В В В В В В В  NAOMI walks on.В  MIKE goes over, enters: 105В В В В  INT. LIEUTENANTВ’S OFFICE/HOMICIDE UNIT -

dialogues.speaker: NIGHT
dialogues.text: В В В В В В В В В  MIKE stands there, looks around.В  He tries to feel his В В В В В В В В В  fatherВ’s presence.В  He finds one picture on the wall of В В В В В В В В В  Giardello, takes Rosary out of his pocket and hangs it on В В В В В В В В В  corner of frame.В  PEMBLETON enters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh.В  Hello, IВ’m Frank Pembleton.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mike Giardello.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I heard about Gee... IВ’m sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (nods)

dialogues.text: Thank you for catching the man who

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: killed my father.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: guys.В  Caught me a couple tonight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (looks at Squad Room)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lotta people have worked in that

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: room over the years.В  Lot of В‘em

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: in the line of duty.В  Steve Crosetti

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: committed suicide.В  To this day, no

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: one knows why...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you miss it, Homicide?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I dunno.В  You can never really escape,

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: yВ’know, В‘cause death is everyday,

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: death goes on and on and on...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ThatВ’s because life goes on and on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here.В  And there...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is there?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wherever. В В В В В В В В В  A moment of silence.В  THEY exit.

В В В В В В В В В  As MIKE and PEMBLETON exit Squad Room they walk past В В В В В В В В В  GIARDELLO, who enters.В  They canВ’t see each other.В  GIARDELLO В В В В В В В В В  stops, looks around, surprised to find himself there.В  The В В В В В В В В В  unfamiliar FACES of a moment ago are gone, replaced by POLICE В В В В В В В В В  OFFICERS from the Twenties, Thirties, Forties, Fifties, В В В В В В В В В  Sixties, Seventies and Eighties in period uniforms.В  All В В В В В В В В В  killed in the line of duty.В  GIARDELLO acknowledges a few of В В В В В В В В В  them, nods to three OFFICERS killed by Junior Bunk in the В В В В В В В В В  big Squad Room shoot-out.В  A LITTLE BLACK GIRL skips by him. В В В В В В В В В  He knows who she is:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adena Watson. В В В В В В В В В  GIARDELLO exits into:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: and BEAU FELTON are playing cards at a table В В В В В В В В В  set with four chairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, hey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gee.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Crosetti.В  Felton.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We been waiting on you.В  Have a seat. В В В В В В В В В  CROSETTI deals down card, then up card all around. CROSETTI (cont.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ten of spades to Mister Beau Felton.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack of diamonds to my esteemed

dialogues.text: Lieutenant, eight of clubs to yours

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: truly --

dialogues.text: WhatВ’re we playing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Five card stud. В В В В В В В В В  They bid around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ten.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: IВ’ll meet that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Too soon to quit.В  IВ’ll pay to see

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: one more. В В В В В В В В В  TheyВ’re all in, CROSETTI deals another card to each. CROSETTI (cont.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pair of tens showing to Mister Felton,

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: another diamond for Gee, possible

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: flush -- and a handful of nothing

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: for the little Dago dealer.В  Pair of

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: tens bets --

dialogues.text: WhoВ’s the fourth chair for?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We donВ’t know yet.В  But theyВ’ll be

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: here sooner or later.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anybody I know?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe.В  It ainВ’t like itВ’s written

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: in stone, Lieutenant.В  Pre-ordained

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: or anything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take you, for example.В  If youВ’d

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: just slept five minutes longer this

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: morning, you woulda run into this

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: fender bender on Light Street on

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: your way to the Inner Harbor --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: late for your speech --

dialogues.text: And the guy who shot you woulda got

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: nervous and left --

dialogues.text: And we wouldnВ’t now be having the

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: pleasure of your company.

dialogues.text: I suddenly got worried that -- My

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: son, heВ’s a cop.В  I thought, maybe --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wouldnВ’t worry.В  Life is short,

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: but once youВ’re dead, youВ’re a long

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: time dead, if you know what I mean.

dialogues.text: Your son -- ?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Michael.

dialogues.text: HeВ’s a good kid?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah.

dialogues.text: You taught him well?

dialogues.text: I did my best.В  I wish IВ’d --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh-uh-uh.В  No regrets.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just have to wait and see.В  See what

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: hand heВ’s dealt --

dialogues.text: And how he plays it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The best thing about this place?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All those cares and worries you had

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: in life?В  They donВ’t matter anymore.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rest in peace, means what it says.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You want some coffee?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Coffee?В  Coffee would be good.В  You

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: got espresso?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Espresso?В  Where do you think you

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: are?В  Heaven?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (re:В  the bid)
